alert.note: Alert for Adams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN LEWIS AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Manchester, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... West Union, Manchester, Rome, Blue Creek, Concord, Bentonville, Trinity, Carrs, Bradysville and Cedar Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
